/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. 

On the left side of the street, a gas station stands out with its distinctive red and white striped awning. A few cars are parked at the station, adding to the urban feel of the scene. On the right side of the street, a row of trees lines the sidewalk, their green leaves contrasting with the concrete structures around them. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant energy and architectural charm.
